    • Method Detail

      • registerStartupActivity

        public void registerStartupActivity(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Description copied from class: StartupManager
        Registers an activity that is performed during project load while the "Loading Project" progress bar is displayed. You may NOT access the PSI structures from the activity.
        Specified by:
        registerStartupActivity in class StartupManager
        Parameters:
        runnable - the activity to execute.

      • registerPostStartupActivity

        public void registerPostStartupActivity(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Description copied from class: StartupManager
        Registers an activity that is performed during project load after the "Loading Project" progress bar is displayed. You may access the PSI structures from the activity.

        Consider to use StartupManager.registerPostStartupDumbAwareActivity(java.lang.Runnable) if possible.
        Specified by:
        registerPostStartupActivity in class StartupManager
        Parameters:
        runnable - the activity to execute.
        See Also:
        StartupActivity.POST_STARTUP_ACTIVITY

      • registerPostStartupDumbAwareActivity

        public void registerPostStartupDumbAwareActivity(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Description copied from class: StartupManager
        Registers an DumbAware activity that is performed during project load, after the "Loading Project" progress bar is displayed, in a pooled thread.
        Specified by:
        registerPostStartupDumbAwareActivity in class StartupManager
        Parameters:
        runnable - the activity to execute.
        See Also:
        StartupActivity.POST_STARTUP_ACTIVITY

      • runWhenProjectIsInitialized

        public void runWhenProjectIsInitialized(java.lang.Runnable action)
        Description copied from class: StartupManager
        Executes the specified runnable immediately if invoked from AWT thread and the initialization of the current project is complete; otherwise, registers it as a post-startup activity. In the latter case, the runnable will be executed later on AWT thread in a non-modal state.
        Specified by:
        runWhenProjectIsInitialized in class StartupManager
        Parameters:
        action - the activity to execute.
        See Also:
        ModalityState, Application.invokeLater(Runnable)

      • runAfterOpened

        public void runAfterOpened(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Description copied from class: StartupManager
        Registers activity that is executed after project loaded. The runnable will be executed in current thread if project is already opened.

        See https://github.com/JetBrains/intellij-community/blob/master/platform/service-container/overview.md#startup-activity.
        Specified by:
        runAfterOpened in class StartupManager

        public void prepareForNextTest()
